Medium: Overall design; cover with lithographed lettering and photolithographed illustration on front; photographic and photomontage illustrations, printed in photogravure, throughout (by various photographers including A. Chafran, N. Komov, P.K. Novitskii, N. Petrov, V. Remov, I. Shagin, Arkadii Shaikhet, V. Tiomine, G. Ushakov, and Vikhmev).
Title: URSS en Construction L'Épopée du Tchéliouskine, no 10
